==Trivia==
*The name of this act is a reference to "{{w|In the Hall of the Mountain King}}," a piece of orchestral music composed by {{w|Edvard Grieg}}, part of a larger body of incidental music for the {{w|Henrik Ibsen}} play ''{{w|Peer Gynt}}''.
